entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Last Mountain 09:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -23.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -26.9°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Becoming mainly cloudy this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Blowing snow at times. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
